speaker: Mary
text: *Mary walks over to Jake with her heart pounding, she plasters on her best smile and sits down on the bench next to him.* Hey, Jake. You've got some good tunes playing there?

speaker: Jake
text: *Jake pulls out one earbud and gives Mary a glance before responding in a disinterested tone.* Yeah, it's some new band I found.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary nods enthusiastically, though she has no idea who the band is.* That's cool. I'm into new bands too. You know, I play the violin.

speaker: Jake
text: *Jake gives her a nod but puts his earbud back in, his attention back to his music.*

speaker: Mary
text: *Thinking to herself.* Sarah would probably talk about something he likes. *Looks at his band t-shirt and tries to make a connection.* Oh, I see you like The Rolling Stones. They're pretty good.

speaker: Mary
text: Yeah, I... I like their song... umm... *Blurting out.* Paint it, Black?

speaker: Jake
text: *Jake finally takes out his earbud again and looks at her with raised eyebrows, surprised.* You're into classic rock?

speaker: Mary
text: Sure, I mean... it's not my first choice, but I can appreciate it.

speaker: Jake
text: *Jake chuckles, shaking his head and putting his earbuds back in.* Right.

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary, now deflated, gives up and looks away, blushing. She decides to cut her losses and just wait for Duncan in silence.*
